pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Pinky Herman Collection of Columns Written for Television Industry Newspapers
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains columns published in the entertainment trade papers, including "Television Today," "Motion Picture Daily" and "Radio/TV Daily." The columns cover projects and industry professionals from 1943-1950 and 1954-1971.
